entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Tofino
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:10 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tofino Airport 05:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -1.8°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Humidity: 53 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -10.2°C
Wind: NE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. 40 percent chance of flurries near Zeballos and Tahsis this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 cm. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy or snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain at times heavy mixed with wet snow in the morning. Wet snow inland late in the morning and in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm except 10 cm inland. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h in the morning except 60 over exposed coastal sections in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain or snow. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain or snow. Windy. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023
